sqlMap.select: SELECT STUDENTID as studentid, FIRST_NAME as firstName, MIDDLE_NAME as middleName, LAST_NAME as lastName, BIRTHDATE as birthDate, REPORT_STUDENTID as reportStudentId FROM STUDENT_DIM WHERE STUDENTID = #studentid:NUMERIC#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO STUDENT_DIM ( STUDENTID, FIRST_NAME, MIDDLE_NAME, LAST_NAME, BIRTHDATE, REPORT_STUDENTID ) VALUES ( #studentid:NUMERIC#, #firstName:VARCHAR#, #middleName:VARCHAR#, #lastName:VARCHAR#, #birthDate:TIMESTAMP#, #reportStudentId:VARCHAR# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE STUDENT_DIM SET FIRST_NAME = #firstName:VARCHAR#, MIDDLE_NAME = #middleName:VARCHAR#, LAST_NAME = #lastName:VARCHAR#, BIRTHDATE = #birthDate:TIMESTAMP#, REPORT_STUDENTID = #reportStudentId:VARCHAR# WHERE STUDENTID = #studentid:NUMERIC#
